message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $900,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $750,000 is a bit lower than what I had in mind, I'm willing to come down to $850,000.  This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the product's worth. Let's meet in the middle!
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $850,000 is still a bit high.  I'm willing to go up to $825,000.  This is a fair price considering we are both trying to make a deal.
